title: "while_loops"
format: html
---

```{python}
x = 0
if x < 10:
    print(x, "is less than 10.")
```

```{python}
x = 0
while x < 10:
    print(x, "is less than 10.")
    x = x + 1
```

```{python}
name = "The University of Kentucky"
while name: 
      print("|" + name + "|") 
      name = name[0:-1]
```
